original_solution_mapping.L1: It takes 15 minutes to bake, 30 minutes for the white icing to harden and 30 minutes for the chocolate icing to harden so it takes 15+30+30 = <<15+30+30=75>>75 minutes
original_solution_mapping.L2: Every hour has 60 minutes and it takes her 2 hours so it takes 60*2 = <<60*2=120>>120 minutes to make the cookies
original_solution_mapping.L3: It takes 120 minutes to make the cookies from start to finish and she spends 75 minutes baking and hardening icing so it takes her 120-75=<<120-75=45>>45 minutes to make the batter and cool the cookies

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4202.
    Returns: the time it takes to make the dough and cool the cookies.
    """
    # L1
    bake_time = 15 # bake the cookies for 15 minutes
    white_icing_harden_time = 30 # allow the icing to harden for 30 minutes
    chocolate_icing_harden_time = 30 # allowed to harden for an additional 30 minutes
    total_fixed_time = bake_time + white_icing_harden_time + chocolate_icing_harden_time

    # L2
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    total_hours = 2 # 2 hours to make the cookies from start to finish
    total_time_in_minutes = minutes_per_hour * total_hours

    # L3
    dough_and_cool_time = total_time_in_minutes - total_fixed_time

    # FA
    answer = dough_and_cool_time
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: It takes {bake_time} minutes to bake, {white_icing_harden_time} minutes for the white icing to harden and {chocolate_icing_harden_time} minutes for the chocolate icing to harden so it takes {bake_time}+{white_icing_harden_time}+{chocolate_icing_harden_time} = <<{bake_time}+{white_icing_harden_time}+{chocolate_icing_harden_time}={total_fixed_time}>>{total_fixed_time} minutes

Every hour has {minutes_per_hour} minutes and it takes her {total_hours} hours so it takes {minutes_per_hour}*{total_hours} = <<{minutes_per_hour}*{total_hours}={total_time_in_minutes}>>{total_time_in_minutes} minutes to make the cookies

It takes {total_time_in_minutes} minutes to make the cookies from start to finish and she spends {total_fixed_time} minutes baking and hardening icing so it takes her {total_time_in_minutes}-{total_fixed_time}=<<{total_time_in_minutes}-{total_fixed_time}={dough_and_cool_time}>>{dough_and_cool_time} minutes to make the batter and cool the cookies
